Get list of all weather stations within specified distance

Source: R/stations.R
get_stations_by_dist.Rd

Get a list of weather stations within a provided distance from a given weather station.

Usage

get_stations_by_dist(station, distance, sort_by = "name")

Arguments

station

The station to retrieve details of. Station names will be attempted to be interpreted with an error returned.

distance

Radius from provided station.

sort_by

The column to sort the stations by. Valid values are "name" (the default), "id" or "state".

Value

A data.frame with all the weather stations along with their BoM station ID, Station name, Latitude, Longitude, State and Elevation.

Examples

get_stations_by_dist("Adelaide", 100)
#> Warning: Provided station matched multiple locations.
